Pre-Game Insights: The Magic have gone 13-4 at home. Orlando is the top team in the Eastern Conference in team defense, allowing 103.4 points while holding opponents to 46.4% shooting.
The Jazz are 6-13 on the road. Utah allows the most points in the Western Conference, giving up 119.2 points while allowing opponents to shoot 48.2%
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic score 105.6 points per game, 13.6 fewer points than the 119.2 the Jazz allow.
The Jazz are shooting 46.1% from the field, 0.3% lower than the 46.4% the Magic's opponents have shot this season.
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Magic -6.5; over/under is 212
Others: Gary Harris: out (hamstring), Paolo Banchero: out (oblique), Jalen Suggs: out (back), Anthony Black: day to day (back), Franz Wagner: out (oblique), Moritz Wagner: out for season (knee).
